Package com.csse3200.game.components.player

Class DeathScreenDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RenderComponent
com.csse3200.game.ui.UIComponent
com.csse3200.game.components.player.DeathScreenDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, Comparable<Renderable>
public class DeathScreenDisplay extends UIComponent
The UI component responsible for rendering and managing the death screen interface. It provides options for restarting and exiting the game.
